sentences.en: Can you explain what the law of universal gravitation is?
sentences.cn: 你能说明什么叫万有引力定律 吗 ?

sentences.en: Einstein's Law of Gravitation was tested during an eclipse of the sun.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦的引力定律在一次日蚀期间得到了检验.

sentences.en: Gravitation is presumably a modification of space - time.
sentences.cn: 万有引力则大概是空时的一种变态.

sentences.en: It is gravitation that causes the apple to fall.
sentences.cn: 是地心吸引力使苹果下落.

sentences.en: It obeys the law of gravitation.
Newton's law of gravitation refers to the force between two particles.
sentences.cn: 牛顿的万有引力定律指的是两个质点之间的力.

sentences.en: Newton's law of universal gravitation has been extremely useful.
sentences.cn: 牛顿的万有引力定律是极其有用的.

sentences.en: Newton's law of universal gravitation is valid.
sentences.cn: 牛顿万有引力定律是正确的.

sentences.en: Newton's theory of gravitation is an approximation of a more general theory.
sentences.cn: 牛顿的引力理论只是一种更普遍理论的近似形式.

sentences.en: Our business , then, is to overcome this action of gravitation.
sentences.cn: 所以我们必须战胜重力的作用.

sentences.en: The comet nucleus itself is too small to hold on to these gases through gravitation.
sentences.cn: 慧核本身太小,它的引力不足以束缚住这些气体.

sentences.en: The law of gravitation explains many phenomena not previously, understood.
sentences.cn: 引力定律解释了许多以前所不能理解的现象.

sentences.en: The potential equation had figured in the eighteenth - century work on gravitation.
sentences.cn: 位势方程在十八世纪关于引力的研究中已显露头角.

sentences.en: To understand galaxy formation we would like to think of gravitation.
sentences.cn: 为了理解星系的形成,我们总要想到万有引力.

sentences.en: We owe to Newton the principle of gravitation.
sentences.cn: 万有引力原理的发现应归功于牛顿.

words.tran_cn: [力] 重力的，[力] 引力的
受重力作用的；万有引力的
比重计；[地物] 重力计
[相对][高能] 引力子；万有吸引力
重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严
重力；[力]万有引力；地心吸力

trans.tran_en: the force that causes two objects such as  planets  to move towards each other because of their  mass
